item.title: Rite Aid closes down all remaining stores after bankruptcy
item.description: Rite Aid has permanently closed all stores after filing for bankruptcy twice in two years, ending the pharmacy chain's 60-year operation in the U.S.

item.title: Latin America's socialist experiments leave devastating trail of economic collapse and poverty
item.description: Venezuela's economy collapsed under Hugo Chavez's socialism, with hyperinflation reaching 63,000% in 2018 despite the country's vast oil reserves.
